snippet: Information has become easier to steal over the Internet because employees can carry proprietary data around.
abstract: Officials at American government agencies, research groups and businesses are adopting elaborate digital security protocols when traveling in Russia and China; information has become easier to steal over the internet as more employees carry proprietary data on their smartphones and laptops, allowing hackers to leapfrog into employers' networks; experts say digital espionage is a particular threat in China and Russia due to those countries' extensive resources and interest in acquiring government information and corporate trade secrets.
lead_paragraph: Information has become easier to steal over the Internet because employees can carry proprietary data around.

headline.seo: Electronic Security a Worry in an Age of Digital Espionage
headline.main: Traveling Light in a Time of Digital Thievery
